cards.title: Knight fork
cards.description: A Knight fork is one of the more common forks you'll encounter. In this case the Knight on f6 is attacking both the Queen on d8 and the Rook and h8. The opponent can save one of these pieces, but the other one is lost.

cards.title: Fork with check
cards.description: A fork with a check is very strong. Because one of the rules in chess is that you have to protect your King, the opponent must respond by moving their King, thus losing their Queen.
